chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
oiai: output_implies_applied_interface
aiii: applied_implies_input_interface
copi: causal_order_preserved_interface
iboi: input_before_output_interface
oci: output_correct_interface
ogii: output_greatest_id_interface

Goal:
forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (ir : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)) (i : input) (o : output) (k : key), exported env_i env_o ir tr -> env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o (ir ++ [IRI k; IRO k]) (tr ++ [(i, o)])

Premises:
Record output_implies_applied_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_implies_applied_interface { output_implies_applied : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> in_applied_entries client id net } Arguments output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => (clientId * nat)%type : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments key {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record output_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_correct_interface { output_correct_invariant : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net)) } Arguments output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record applied_implies_input_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_implies_input_interface { applied_implies_input : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr } Arguments applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params
Record output_greatest_id_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_greatest_id_interface { output_greatest_id : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> greatest_id_for_client client id net } Arguments output_greatest_id_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_greatest_id_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Record causal_order_preserved_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_causal_order_preserved_interface { causal_order_preserved : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (client' : clientId) (id' : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> output_before_input client id client' id' tr -> entries_ordered client id client' id' net } Arguments causal_order_preserved_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_causal_order_preserved_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Inductive exported (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> Prop := exported_nil : exported env_i env_o [] [] | exported_IO : forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr) | exported_IU : forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i
Record input_before_output_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_input_before_output_interface { output_implies_input_before_output : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> input_before_output client id tr } Arguments input_before_output_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_input_before_output_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive IR (K : Type) : Type := IRI : K -> IR K | IRO : K -> IR K | IRU : K -> IR K Arguments IR _%type_scope Arguments IRI {K}%type_scope Arguments IRO {K}%type_scope Arguments IRU {K}%type_scope
exported_IO : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)
exported_IU : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)
exported_ind : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (P : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) ->...-> P l l0
exported_sind : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (P : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) ->...-> P l l0
exported_nil : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output), exported env_i env_o [] []
log_to_IR = fix log_to_IR (env_o : key -> option output) (log : list entry) {struct log} : list (IR key) := match log with | [] => [] | {| eClient := client; eId := id |} :: log' => match env_o (client, id) with | Some _ => [IRI (client, id); IRO (client, id)] | None => [IRI (client, id); IRU (client, id)] end ++ log_to_IR env_o log' end : (key -> option output) -> list entry -> list (IR key) Arguments log_to_IR _%function_scope _%list_scope
get_IR_output_keys_log_to_IR : forall (l : list entry) (env_o : key -> option output), get_IR_output_keys key (log_to_IR env_o l) = map (fun e : entry => (eClient e, eId e)) l
get_IR_input_keys_log_to_IR : forall (l : list entry) (env_o : key -> option output), get_IR_input_keys key (log_to_IR env_o l) = map (fun e : entry => (eClient e, eId e)) l
import_get_output : forall (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key), In (O k) (import tr) -> exists o : output, get_output tr k = Some o
step_1_ind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P d d0 l
step_1_sind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P d d0 l
good_trace_ind : forall (K : Type) (P : list (IR K) -> Prop -> Prop), P [] True -> (forall k : K, P [IRI k] False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), P (IRI k :: IRI k' :: ir) False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), P ir (good_trace K ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRO k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace K ir)) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), P ir (good_trace K ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRU k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace K ir)) ->...-> forall ir : list (IR K), P ir (good_trace K ir)
get_output = fix get_output (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key) {struct tr} : option output := match tr with | [] => None | (_, inl _) :: xs => get_output xs k | (_, inr os) :: xs => match get_output' os k with | Some o => Some o | None => get_output xs k end end : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> key -> option output Arguments get_output _%list_scope
Inductive step_1 (P : BaseParams) (params : OneNodeParams P) : step_relation data (input * output) := S1T_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> step_1 s s' [(i, out)] Arguments step_1 {P params} Arguments S1T_deliver {P params} _ _ [s' out]
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output -> list entry -> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
get_IR_input_of_log_to_IR : forall (env : key -> option output) (log : list entry), get_IR_input_keys key (log_to_IR env log) = map (fun e : entry => (eClient e, eId e)) log
get_IR_output_of_log_to_IR : forall (env : key -> option output) (log : list entry), get_IR_output_keys key (log_to_IR env log) = map (fun e : entry => (eClient e, eId e)) log
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
IR_equivalent_all_Is_I : forall (K : Type) (l : list (IR K)) (k : K), (forall x : IR K, In x l -> exists k0 : K, x = IRI k0) -> IR_equivalent K (l ++ [IRI k]) (IRI k :: l)
S1T_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> step_1 s s' [(i, out)]
get_output_import_O : forall (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key) (out : output), get_output tr k = Some out -> In (O k) (import tr)
in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ in_output_list client id o os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
IRU_not_O_preserved : forall (K : Type) (xs ys zs : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRI_I_preserved : forall (K : Type) (xs ys zs : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), ~ In k' (get_IR_input_keys K ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRI k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRU_I_preserved : forall (K : Type) (xs ys zs : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys K ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRO_O_preserved : forall (K : Type) (xs ys zs : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys K ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall (K : Type) (P : list (op K) -> list (IR K) -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list (op K)) (out : list (IR K)), ~ acknowledged_op K k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops K tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list (op K)) (out : list (IR K)), ~ acknowledged_op K k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops K tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) ->...-> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall (K : Type) (P : list (op K) -> list (IR K) -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list (op K)) (out : list (IR K)), ~ acknowledged_op K k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops K tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list (op K)) (out : list (IR K)), ~ acknowledged_op K k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops K tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list (op K)) (out : list (IR K)), acknowledged_op K k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops K tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
in_input_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists h : name, In (h, inl (ClientRequest client id i)) tr : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_input_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
O_IRO_preserved : forall (K : Type) (xs ys zs : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), NoDup (get_op_output_keys K (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In (IRO k) ir
IR_equiv_eg1 : forall (K : Type) (k k' : K), k <> k' -> IR_equivalent K [IRI k; IRI k'; IRO k; IRO k'] [IRI k; IRO k; IRI k'; IRO k']
IRO_O_preserved_IU : forall (K : Type) (xs ys : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys)
O_IRO_preserved_IU : forall (K : Type) (xs ys : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> In (IRO k) ir
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> network -> Prop Arguments applied_implies_input_state {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
in_applied_entries_in_IR : forall (log : list entry) (e : entry) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (env : clientId * nat -> option output), eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> In e log -> (exists o : output, env (client, id) = Some o) -> In (IRO (client, id)) (log_to_IR env log)
get_output' = fix get_output' (os : list raft_output) (k : key) {struct os} : option output := match os with | [] => None | NotLeader _ _ :: xs => get_output' xs k | ClientResponse c id o :: xs => if sumbool_and (c = fst k) (c <> fst k) (id = snd k) (id <> snd k) (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) (Nat.eq_dec id (snd k)) then Some o else get_output' xs k end : list raft_output -> key -> option output Arguments get_output' _%list_scope
execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
in_before_before_preserved_IU : forall (K : Type) (xs ys : list (op K)) (k : K) (ir : list (IR K)), NoDup (get_op_input_keys K (xs ++ I k :: ys)) -> (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI k :: IRU k :: ir)) -> forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ ys) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ ys) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) ir
IRU_not_O_preserved_IU : forall (K : Type) (xs ys : list (op K)) (k' : K) (ir : list (IR K)), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ ys)
IR_equiv_eg2 : forall (K : Type) (k k' : K), k <> k' -> IR_equivalent K [IRI k; IRI k'; IRO k; IRO k'] [IRI k'; IRO k'; IRI k; IRO k]

```coq
intros env_i env_o ir tr i o k Hexp Henvi Henvo.
induction ir.
- simpl. constructor.
- inversion Hexp; subst.
  + constructor; auto.
  + specialize (IHir H0).
    constructor; auto.
